body:
### Problem
`scons` uses `#!/usr/bin/env python` in its script. This causes e.g. `serf` and other `SconsPackage`s to fail to build on my ubuntu machine which has no `python` symlink.

### Solution
Patch `scons` to explicitly refer to `#!/usr/bin/env python3`.
title: patch serf and scons to use #!/usr/bin/env python3
